channel.title: [P.I] Ancient Curse help!
channel.description:
Well, I added the interface to my client, Then went ahead and made a command so I could switch threw both Modern and Ancient prayer interfaces, I got so far and I got stuck, maybe a little help?
[code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:141: cannot find symbol symbol : variable praybook location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands if (praybook == 1) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:144: cannot find symbol symbol : variable praybook location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands } else if (praybook == 2) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Probably something stupidly easy but yeah. -_-

item.title: [P.I] Ancient Curse help!
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

Well, you weren’t correct, I wasn’t too sure what to add their and i just wrote it down. Like i said I’m pretty new to this, you may be right but I’m not sure, heres my command incase it helps at all. (I just added the command, nothing more.)

if (playerCommand.startsWith("prayer")) { if (c.inWild()) return; try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (praybook == 1) { c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); c.playerPrayerBook = 1; } else if (praybook == 2) { c.setSidebarInterface(5, 25500); c.playerPrayerBook = 2; } } catch (Exception e){} }

Read full topic

item.title: [P.I] Ancient Curse help!
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:141: cannot find symbolsymbol  : variable praybooklocation: class server.model.players.packets.Commands                                if (praybook == 1) {                                    ^src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:144: cannot find symbolsymbol  : variable praybooklocation: class server.model.players.packets.Commands                                } else if (praybook == 2) {                                           ^Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.2 errorsPress any key to continue . . .

Well It looks to me if you made a new class for Handling your prayer books corrent (praybookloaction class)
if not correct me but if so do this go to the top of commands .java and find the other imports
Then add the full directory to the class you made or where ever you put the method for that this is how it would go
lets say you added this new class in the player folder this would most likly be the import

import server.model.players.CLASSNAME HERE;]

Read full topic
